attributes.action: Individual discount codes for teachers to book cheaper holidays in the summer.
attributes.background: Teachers are punished for doing a job they love by having to pay extortionate prices during the summer holiday to have a break away. Every full time teacher should be given an individualized discount code to use with any travel company during the holidays.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Travel and holiday companies are responsible for the discounts and offers they provide.
